create_product_excel.success: Your products have been have successfully added
create_product_excel.fail: There was an error creating new products from the file you uploaded, please check if you followed all the tips and try again
create_product_excel.file_type_err: Invalid file extension. Only XLSX files are allowed
create_product_excel.tip: Tips for creating products with an Excel file
create_product_excel.tip1: Ensure Excel File Format: Please upload an Excel file in the appropriate format (e.g., XLSX) to ensure compatibility with the system
create_product_excel.tip2: Prepare Spreadsheet: Organize your spreadsheet with the product details. Make sure each column corresponds to the correct field (e.g., name, description, price, category, etc.). See example below
create_product_excel.tip3: Validate Price and Price Range: Check the following requirements for the price and price range fields
create_product_excel.tip3_1: If the price is greater than 0, both the minimum and maximum price range should be 0
create_product_excel.tip3_2: If the product has a sale price, input the regular price in the "price" field and the sale price (which is the price after the sale) in the "sale_price" field. Leave the "price_range_min" and "price_range_max" fields as 0, as they are not applicable in this case
create_product_excel.tip3_3: If the product does not have a specific price, set both the price and the sale price to 0. Then input the desired price range values in the "price_range_min" field as the minimum value and in the "price_range_max" field as the maximum value
create_product_excel.tip4: If the product is available, enter the stock quantity in the "stock_quantity" field. If the product is not available, enter 0 in the "stock_quantity" field
create_product_excel.tip5: If the product is returnable, enter the number of days within which the product can be returned in the "return_deadline" field. If the product is not returnable, enter 0 in the "return_deadline" field
